      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void callBackBle​(byte[] trame)  
      android.view.View onCreateView​(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, android.view.ViewGroup container, android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Function called when fragment is created
      ➢ Inflate the fragment
      ➢ Get the current player
      ➢ Change the text which display the name by the name of the current player
      ➢ Display the score of the player
      ➢ Get all the buttons representing the pin and add them to a list
      ⇉ For all pins
      ➢ Adapt the display to the width of the phone
      ⟾ Set the function called when players click on the podium
      ➢ Navigate to the scoreboard page
      ⟾ Set the function called when players click on the battery
      ➢ Navigate to the battery listing page
      ⟾ Set the function called when players click on the validate button
      ↦ If the game is not on pause
      ➢ Calculate the number of pin that are fallen
      ↦ If the count is equal to 1
      ➢ Add the value of the pin to the player score
      ➢ Set the value of the number of times player missed all pins to 0
      ➢ Add 1 to the number of times the player tackled one pin
      ➢ Add 1 to the number of pin the player tackled
      ↦ If the count is equal to 0
      ➢ Add 1 to the number of times player missed all pins
      ↦ If the number of times player missed all pins is equal to 3
      ↦ If the type of game is different than tournament
      ➢ Set the value of the number of times player missed all pins to 0
      ➢ Set the score value to 0
      ↦ If the type of game is tournament
      ➢ Set the score value to 0
      ➢ Remove the player from the list (he is disqualified)
      ↦ If the count is different than 0 & 1
      ➢ Add the value of count to the player score
      ➢ Set the value of the number of times player missed all pins to 0
      ➢ Add the count to the number of pin the player tackled
      ↦ If the score is more than the score to win
      ➢ Player score is divided by 2
      ↦ If the game is a tournament and the player is the only one left or if the player score is equal to the score to win
      ➢ Player number is passed as parameter
      ➢ Navigate to the end of game page
      ↦ If end of game is not reached
      ➢ The game is paused between two rounds and interface is updated with scores
      ↦ If the game is on pause
      ➢ Reset the state of all pins
      ➢ Set the parameter as the next player to play
      ➢ Navigate to a new page game with the parameter the next player
      ⟾ Set the function called when players click on the back button
      ➢ Create an alert dialog which will ask if the User really want to leave the current game, if he selects yes he will be redirected to the main menu, otherwise the game continues
      void onPause()  
      void onResume()  
      void onStop()  
      private void updateButton()
      Function to update the button validate ↦ If the game is not on pause
      ➢ Count the number of fallen pins
      ↦ If only one pin fell
      ➢ Set the text of the button according to the pin number
      ↦ If no pin fell
      ➢ Set the text of the button according to the count
      ↦ If the player already missed 2 times and the type of game is a tournament
      ➢ Button asks if player is disqualified ↦ If more than one pin fell
      ➢ Set the text of the button according to the count
      ↦ If the game is on pause
      ➢ Set the text of the button to Next Turn
      private void updateInterface()
      Function to update the page ➢ Set the displayed score to the score of the player
      ⇉ Display cross for the number of times a player missed
      ⇉ for each pin
      ↦ If the game is not on pause
      ⟾ Change the state of the pin when clicked
      ↦ If the game is on pause
      ➢ Make the button not clickable
      ↦ If the pin is not connected
      ➢ Display the drawable of disconnected pin
      ↦ If the pin is connected
      ➢ Display the drawable of connected pin
      ↦ If the pin is not connected
      ➢ Display the drawable of disconnected pin
      ➢ Update the button
